it.ma.polimi.briscola.model.deck

Class AbstractDeck<CARD extends Card>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.ma.polimi.briscola.model.deck.AbstractCardListWrapper<CARD>
      • it.ma.polimi.briscola.model.deck.AbstractDeck<CARD>
  • Type Parameters:
    CARD - the type parameter
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CardListWrapper<CARD>, Deck<CARD>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NeapolitanDeck

    public abstract class AbstractDeck<CARD extends Card>
extends AbstractCardListWrapper<CARD>
implements Deck<CARD>
    Abstract class implementing some operations whose implementations are common to any deck. Extends AbstractCardListWrapper, thus inheriting the convenience methods implemented in AbstractCardListWrapper

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractDeck()
      Default constructor, only implemented to allow descendants to have their own default constructor
      AbstractDeck(java.util.List<CARD> cards)
      Instantiates a new Abstract deck from a list of cards.
      AbstractDeck(java.lang.String list)
      Instantiates a new Abstract deck containing the list of cards represented by the string passed as an argument.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CARD drawCardFromBottom()
      Draw card from the deck's bottom, as a side effect the card is removed from the deck.
      CARD drawCardFromTop()
      Draw card from top of the deck, as a side effect the card is removed from the deck
      void putCardToBottom(Card card)
      Put a card to the deck's bottom.
      AbstractDeck<CARD> shuffleDeck(Shuffler shuffler)
      Shuffle deck.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractDeck

        public AbstractDeck()
        Default constructor, only implemented to allow descendants to have their own default constructor

      • AbstractDeck

        public AbstractDeck(java.lang.String list)
        Instantiates a new Abstract deck containing the list of cards represented by the string passed as an argument. The string is made of string representations of cards. Left-most card is the topmost.
        Parameters:
        list - The string representing the list of cards contained in the deck

      • AbstractDeck

        public AbstractDeck(java.util.List<CARD> cards)
        Instantiates a new Abstract deck from a list of cards. The lowest index represents the topmost card.
        Parameters:
        cards - The list of cards contained in the deck.
